reviewText: This is a wonderful means to help children visually see a Bible story come to life and learn while enjoying the beautiful color and wonderful sound quality.  a great purchase....a must for a Christian household with children.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colors

reviewText: Using this video as a Christmas present for the kids. Although I haven't seen this video yet, I'm sure it will be a great addition to the other videos that we already own from this series.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colors

reviewText: This DVD production of the Joseph & The Coat of Many Colors story has accomplished exactly what I had hoped for my 3yr old son: an interest in learning about the Lord and His involvement in the lives of those who trust Him.  My son often recites (in surprising detail) various scenes from the tale.  One of my fellow brothers in Christ calls my son "The Little Preacher" because my son enjoys capturing the attention of those around him so he can retell the story of Joseph & The Coat of Many Colors.  I understand some reviewing this telling of the story may prefer stricter adherence to various nuances and literary exactness from Scripture - I can appreciate that as I am a literal believer of Scripture.  There is never a perfect retelling of any Biblical story that will appeal to everyone's preference.  As already mentioned, this achieved what I had hoped for my son: help him develop an interest in learning about the Lord, building a faith in the Lord, and forgiving those who wrong him.
summary: Inspiring Interest in a Future Believer
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colors

reviewText: Although my 5 year old grandson was impatient for Charleton Heston's recap of the story to be over (which I enjoyed), once the cartoon portion began, he was enthralled.  Good animation and a story well told.  Could have done without the hokey song about dreams, which was repeated throughout.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colors

reviewText: Purchased for Sunday School summer program.. Ages K-5.  Story pretty much sticks to Bible story.
Title: Greatest Heroes and Legends of the Bible: Joseph and the Coat of Many Colors
